Don't let the zombies stop you

editorialNotes.standard: Get behind the wheel of the worldâ€™s fastest cars in this graphical powerhouseâ€”and experience a singularly cool documentary-like career mode.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Developer Jan Ilavsky came up with the idea for this gorgeous Apple Design Award winner after heâ€™d broken his arm. He started on an infinite runner that could be played one-handed, and since heâ€™s also colorblind, he added a gameplay element about changing between vibrant neon colors. Chameleon Run succeeds beautifully, balancing wicked speed with irresistible, just-one-more-try challenges.
editorialNotes.short: You'll need quick reactions in this intense polychromatic platformer.

editorialNotes.standard: An absolutely blistering sensation of speed lies at the core of this intriguing mash-up of racing game and infinite runner. As you guide a futuristic ship toward the horizon by tapping either side of the screen to steer, you have to whip around obstacles and snare energy boosts to stay alive. Some sessions are over in seconds, some triumphantly stretch into minutes. Spare, modern graphics set the perfect mood as you inevitably become obsessed with zooming just a little bit farther on your next run.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Real go kart racing on asphalt

editorialNotes.standard: Multiple camera angles, rally racing, demolition derbiesâ€”weâ€™re impressed by the variety packed into this adrenaline-fueled racer.

ios.subtitle: Race the golden era of rally

editorialNotes.tagline: Itâ€™s a golden age for rallying

editorialNotes.standard: Packing tons of great vehicles and multiple ways to play, Mini Motor Racing hits the sweet spot between frantic arcade driving and the depth of realistic racers. The look is cute yet richly detailed, with luscious lighting and environmental effects across a variety of tracks and terrains. Win cash to upgrade your ride in the lengthy career mode, or hit the quickplay and multiplayer circuits for a spin around the block. However you roll, flexible steering options let you drive with precision for a great time behind the wheel.

name: Toddler Racing Car Game for Kids. Premium
artistName: Gadget Software Development and Research LLC

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: In Hello Games' side-scrolling racer, you control the eponymous stunt devil as he jumps, wheelies, and backflips through a huge assortment of death-defying levels. With tricks to master, costumes to unlock, and leaderboards to conquer, Joe Danger is a wacky blast. Youâ€™ll don an Elvis getup, evade flying saucers, and soar over shark tanks in increasingly treacherous tracks. After all, they donâ€™t call him Joe Danger for nothing.

This breakneck chapter in the Riptide GP series is so intense, itâ€™s got us reaching for a life jacket. Or maybe several: Renegadeâ€™s solo campaign packs tons of water-racing events and sick tricks to master. (Split-screen local and eight-player online matches are our favorites.) However you play, stunning tracks like a gorgeous forest river deliver awesome arcade thrills. On Apple TV, it's our 2016 Game of the Year.
editorialNotes.short: Manage your speed and watch out for waves in this brilliant water-racing sequel.

editorialNotes.standard: Unleash your inner daredevil with Hello Gamesâ€™ electrifying new racing game, a fast-paced side-scroller bursting with fun challenges. As miniature stuntman Joe Danger and his crew of wacky drivers, youâ€™ll pop wheelies, sail off ramps, and even repel missiles and UFOs, snagging collectibles as you go for maximum points. With responsive controls and colorful stages, it'll hook anyone who appreciates an action-packed joyride.

editorialNotes.short: Manage a team of ruff racers.

editorialNotes.short: Tearing across the countryside is a blast with fine-tuned controls.

editorialNotes.standard: There sure is a lot of debris in space. So if you want to survive as an intergalactic pilot, youâ€™ll need to think fast. Thankfully, dodging and weaving through Hyperburnerâ€™s gorgeous levels is pure exhilaration. We love how beating stages â€œrewardsâ€ us with faster shipsâ€”it means the better we get, the harder the game gets.
